ygData.subject: Unicron and the Devil
ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry about the following caps, but that is how I perceive Unicron would speak if it was written down) Unicron/Teufel: Unicron watched the incoming missiles,

Subject: Unicron and the Devil
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Sorry about the following caps, but that is how I perceive Unicron would 
speak if it was written down)

Unicron/Teufel:



Unicron watched the incoming missiles, and watched them all be destroyed.  
Unicron noted the source, a small non-sentient robot that his scans of 
Cybertronian history the Ramora's database provided revealed it to be a 
cyberbee.  It was in fact Double Punch's cyberbee, Beeline.  

Turning his interest back to where it belonged he only laughed.  He changed 
his voice back to its normal tone for intimidation.  His voice would be heard 
in the mind and for some with relatively weak minds compared to Unicron, it 
would hurt.

/YOU, HOT ROD, DO NOT HAVE THE AUTOBOT MATRIX OF LEADERSHIP NOR GALVATRON'S 
INCOMPITENCE TO AID YOU.  NOR ARE YOU RODIMUS PRIME, BUT STILL AN 
INSIGNIFICANT INSECT THAT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DEATH OF OPTIMUS PRIME.  YOU 
COULD NOT EVEN DEFEAT ME WITH YOUR PRECIOUS MATRIX.  YOU WILL ENJOY THE VOID 
SOON ENOUGH./ Unicron's (Orson Welles') voice boomed as if he was speaking 
into several megaphones at once.  

He raised his left arm, firing off two missiles at Hot Rod.  He raised his 
right arm, firing off a sonic wave at Magnus Prime, the ancient being never 
even considering Ultra Magnus to be a threat.  In the Chaos-Bringer's 
opinion, Ultra Magnus was a complete incompitent fool.

---

Teufel's shoulder cannons fired a total of forty rapid laser bolts (20 from 
each) at Zardus.  The cannons in his arms fired off a total of four missiles. 
 Two energy-signature seeking missiles from the left arm cannon at Iron 
Raptor, and two missiles at the CF.  The bland looking robot noted the 
retreat of the bulk of forces attacking the Cybertronian Fire.  Though his 
long range sensors detected Sun Crusher approaching, it was abvious a retreat 
was in effect.
